newsitem.title: UK: Pillar in $117 million shopping spree - newspaper.
newsitem.headline: Pillar in $117 million shopping spree - newspaper.

text.p: Britain's Pillar Property Investments is planning a string of acquisitions worth more than 70 million pounds ($117.6 million) to strengthen its grip on the booming retail property sector, the Sunday Telegraph reported.
Its PillarCaisse joint venture with Canada's La Caisse will this week spend 37 million pounds ($62 million) on shopping centres in Leeds and Accrington in Northern England.
Among other planned purchases, the company was also spending more than 25 million pounds ($42 million) on retail warehousing investments, the newspaper added.
Pillar Property officials were not immediately available to comment.
